member.name: T:AppDomainData
member.summary: Provides strong-typed access to AppDomain storage data.

member.name: M:AppDomainData.SetData``1(``0)
member.summary: Sets the given data in the storage. The returned can be used to remove the state when disposed.

member.name: M:AppDomainData.GetData``1
member.summary: Gets the data from the storage.

member.name: M:AppDomainData.SetData``1(System.AppDomain,``0)
member.summary: Sets the given data in the storage. The returned can be used to remove the state when disposed.
member.param: The domain to set the data on.

member.name: M:AppDomainData.GetData``1(System.AppDomain)
member.summary: Gets the data from the storage.
member.param: The domain to get the data.
